meanings.definition: A person responsible for managing and organizing a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The admin at the office ensures everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The admin's job involves handling paperwork and scheduling.
meanings.sent3: The admin accidentally scheduled two meetings at the same time, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: She was the admin of her friend group, always coordinating plans and events.
meanings.sent5: The admin's desk was always neat and organized, a model of efficiency.

meanings.definition: The process or activity of managing and organizing a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: Good admin is crucial for the success of any company.
meanings.sent2: The admin of the project involved budgeting and resource allocation.
meanings.sent3: The admin of the event went smoothly, thanks to careful planning.
meanings.sent4: Efficient admin is like a well-oiled machine, keeping things running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: Learning effective admin skills can help streamline operations and increase productivity.
